info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 3:08PM CDT until July 17 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MADISON AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. CLAIR COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... At 308 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Venice, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belleville, Granite City, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Fairview Heights, Glen Carbon, Troy, Maryville, Pontoon Beach, Centreville, Caseyville, Washington Park, Madison, Venice, Fairmont City, South Roxana, Alorton, Roxana, and Brooklyn. This also includes Horseshoe Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
